April 29: 4
Genl L. Thomas
Adjutant General U. S.
Washington D. C.
Dear Sir,

I am instructed by the Governor to request that. Corporal Sylvester Rockwell Compy. C. 112th Ills Vols. be discharged to accept a Commission as 2nd Lieutenant Company A. 4: Ky Mtd Infy. The requisite number of men to entitle him to the command are in the field.

Respy
Your obedt. Sevt
John Boyle
Adjt Genl of Ky
